title: grid-template
description: The `grid-template` CSS property is a shorthand for setting the `grid-template-rows`, `grid-template-columns` and `grid-template-areas` properties.
content: The shorthand property that defines the structure of the grid layout by combining `grid-template-rows`, `grid-template-columns` and `grid-template-areas` properties into a single declaration. It provides a concise way to create and organize the entire grid.
